alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued September 09 at 3:04AM PDT until September 10 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TODAY TO MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 101. For the High Wind Warning, east winds 20 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * IMPACTS...Downed trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
